text.div:
Tuberculosis (Tests for Mycobacterium tuberculosis Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    13956-8 Mycobacterium tuberculosis DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    14556-5 Mycobacterium tuberculosis DNA [Presence] in Sputum by NAA with probe detection
    14557-3 Mycobacterium tuberculosis DNA [Presence] in Bronchial specimen by NAA with probe detection

    33634-7 Mycobacterium tuberculosis rifAMPin resistance gene [Identifier] in Sputum by NAA with probe detection
    38379-4 Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    46244-0 Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex rpoB gene rifAMPin resistance mutation identified by Molecular method
    48174-7 Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex rRNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    5027-8 Mycobacterium tuberculosis rRNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Probe
    53257-2 Mycobacterium tuberculosis DNA [#/volume] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection

    78357-1 Mycobacterium tuberculosis DNA [Presence] in Bronchoalveolar lavage by NAA with probe detection

    88166-4 Mycobacterium tuberculosis DNA [Presence] in Ocular fluid by NAA with probe detection
    88874-3 Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex DNA [Presence] in Isolate or Specimen by Molecular genetics method
    89372-7 Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex rpoB gene rifAMPin resistance mutation [Presence] by Molecular method
    90283-3 Mycobacterium tuberculosis DNA [Presence] in Bile fluid by NAA with probe detection
    91763-3 Mycobacterium tuberculosis DNA [Presence] in Aspirate by NAA with probe detection
    91829-2 Mycobacterium tuberculosis DNA [Presence] in Lower respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    92827-5 Mycobacterium tuberculosis complex species identified in Unspecified specimen by Sequencing
